short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nezuko Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Nezuko background for Free. Cute Nezuko wallpaper background for Demon Slayer anime fans.
short.ja: ねずこの壁紙拡張機能は、カスタムのねずこの壁紙HD背景で新しいタブページを変更します。ねずこファンのためのテーマ。
short.ko: 네즈 코 배경 화면 확장은 사용자 정의 네즈 코 배경 화면 HD 배경으로 새 탭 페이지를 변경합니다. 네즈 코 팬을위한 테마.
short.zh_CN: 祢豆子壁纸扩展程序重新定义了您的Chrome新标签页成为祢豆子的背景壁纸。祢豆子粉丝的主题。
short.zh_TW: 祢豆子壁紙擴展程序重新定義了您的Chrome新標籤頁成為祢豆子的背景壁紙。祢豆子粉絲的主題。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension features some of the great Nezuko background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser.
 
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Demon Slayer Nezuko wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Nezuko background or favorite it in wallpaper selection panel.
3. Get easy access to popular sites with Google search.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. New Note for you to write down your tasks.  
7. Get easy access to your history websites. 
8. Add website to Shortcut panel for quick access.
9. Quick access to Google apps.
10. Quick access to More Themes.
11. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
12. Quick access to Download wallpaper.
13. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in new tab.

If you have any questions about our Nezuko wallpaper new tab extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this new tab extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Nezuko wallpaper extension.
4. Press "Remove"

- OR - 
Right-click the extension icon on the extension bar (next to the URL bar) and select Remove from Chrome.
long.ja,ko,zh_CN,zh_TW:
This extension features some of the cool Nezuko background to make you feel good on your Chrome browser. The extension shuffle Nezuko wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 

Turn your Chrome new tab into beautiful and powerful utility browser with Demon Slayer Nezuko Wallpaper extension. Background theme for chromebook, laptop, desktop or pc.
 
Extension Features:

1. Shuffle Nezuko wallpaper every time you open a new tab. 
2. Randomize Demon Slayer Nezuko background theme in settings option.
3. Get easy access to popular sites with custom web search.
4. Quick access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Show current date and time automatically.
6. Sticky notes give you the Nezuko feels in completing real-life tasks. 
7. Get easy access to your most frequently visited websites. 
8. Get easy access to your bookmarks websites.
9. Quick access to Google apps.
10. Quick access to More Themes.
11. Easy Sharing to Social Media.
12. Enable fun snow, rain, falling leaves, fireworks animation in new tab.

If you have any questions about our Nezuko wallpaper new tab extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this new tab extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the wallpaper extension.
4. Press "Remove"

- OR - 
Right-click the extension icon on the extension bar (next to the URL bar) and select Remove from Chrome.
